item.title: 🕸️Graph QnA with LangChain v0.1 @tb_tomaz has some of the best content out there on how to use LLMs to interact with graphs 🚀Over the weekend, ...
item.description:
🕸️Graph QnA with LangChain v0.1

@tb_tomaz has some of the best content out there on how to use LLMs to interact with graphs

🚀Over the weekend, he updated all his content to use LangChain v0.1

Perfect opportunity to jump in and start learning

https://github.com/tomasonjo/blogs/tree/master/llm
item.author: LangChain

item.title: Good quick overview of how to build a question/answering app over audio data!
item.description:
Good quick overview of how to build a question/answering app over audio data!


Afiz ⚡️: Build Question Answering AI App for Audio Data!

Today, we will see how we can build QnA AI app for Audio Data using @AssemblyAI, @LangChainAI and @OpenAI

In just 3 simple steps, we can achieve this.

Let's get started 🚀
item.author: LangChain

item.title: 👨‍💻codeqai 100% local code search and chat powered by vector embeddings and LLMs Uses a lot of awesome tech to accomplish this! 🌲Tree sitter...
item.description:
👨‍💻codeqai

100% local code search and chat powered by vector embeddings and LLMs

Uses a lot of awesome tech to accomplish this!

🌲Tree sitter (for splitting code files)
🧱Sentence Transformers and Instructor embeddings
🌎FAISS
🦙Llama Cpp and @ollama

https://github.com/fynnfluegge/codeqai
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Tomaz Bratanic: Just a couple of days ago, @LangChainAI released a 0.1.0 version ago with some package and syntax changes. To make it easier for yo...
item.description:
RT Tomaz Bratanic
Just a couple of days ago, @LangChainAI released a 0.1.0 version ago with some package and syntax changes. To make it easier for you to integrate @neo4j with LangChain, I have updated my LLM notebooks to follow the new syntax and package structure.

https://github.com/tomasonjo/blogs/tree/master/llm

item.title: 🦜🧠Adding conversational memory to your RAG app The main UX for LLM applications is chat. That makes it important to know how to add conversation...
item.description:
🦜🧠Adding conversational memory to your RAG app

The main UX for LLM applications is chat. That makes it important to know how to add conversational memory to your apps - including you RAG apps!

@curious_kaylynn walks through how to do exactly that!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l1JRl3Mvln0

item.title: 👨‍💻GitChat The goal is for GitChat to be deployed internally at organizations as a helpful, secure, internally-facing AI with knowledge unique ...
item.description:
👨‍💻GitChat

The goal is for GitChat to be deployed internally at organizations as a helpful, secure, internally-facing AI with knowledge unique to each organization.

This OSS project by @kplley exposes a chat interface for a given GitHub repo

Here's why it's awesome:

💯Is a… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1746571111922610415
item.author: LangChain

item.title: The demo below is really interesting for a few reasons: 🦜Uses local LLMs (seems like @MistralAI via @ollama) 🌲RAG integration for PDFs and web p...
item.description:
The demo below is really interesting for a few reasons:

🦜Uses local LLMs (seems like @MistralAI via @ollama)
🌲RAG integration for PDFs and web pages

Even more exciting to us though... it changes up the UX! It's not just simply a chat text box

Super creative and practical


TonyMo: 🚀 Just playing with chatbot for @Decentraland, powered by LLM! 🤖 Fully localized with @OLLAMA , @LangChainAI , and @MistralAI, plus #RAG integration for PDF and web page.

Check out this video showcasing bot in action, inspired by @DecentralGames ' documentation. #AI + #web3
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Jacob Lee: 👪 TogetherAI Embeddings 👪 @togethercompute just launched hosted OSS embeddings! Swap it into your JS RAG pipelines in @LangChainAI...
item.description:
RT Jacob Lee
👪 TogetherAI Embeddings 👪

@togethercompute just launched hosted OSS embeddings! Swap it into your JS RAG pipelines in @LangChainAI 🦜🔗 JS/TS community 0.0.17.

The # of dimensions varies by model, so you may need to set up your vectorstore to match:

https://js.langchain.com/docs/integrations/text_embedding/togetherai

item.description:
🦜🚀Deploy LangChain Apps

Over the past few months we've worked on LangServe - an easy way to deploy LangChain apps

Check out this YouTube video by Ugo Osuji that goes over how to deploy them:

🌎Locally
🏃On Google Cloud Run
🏠On Hosted Langserve

item.title: 🚀Build a Conversational RAG with Mistral-7B and LangChain This post by Madhav Thaker covers three important topics: 🦋How to get started with RAG...
item.description:
🚀Build a Conversational RAG with Mistral-7B and LangChain

This post by Madhav Thaker covers three important topics:

🦋How to get started with RAG
💬How to build a chatbot
🦙How to use open source models

Highly recommend reading!

https://medium.com/@thakermadhav/part-2-build-a-conversational-rag-with-langchain-and-mistral-7b-6a4ebe497185

item.title: LangChain v0.1.0 Highlights ⭐️Agents⭐️ As part of v0.1.0, we: 🖼️Added documentation on the seven different agent types (and when to use each o...
item.description:
LangChain v0.1.0 Highlights

⭐️Agents⭐️

As part of v0.1.0, we:

🖼️Added documentation on the seven different agent types (and when to use each one)
🔗Rewrote agents in LCEL for improved ability to customize

Agent Types: https://python.langchain.com/docs/modules/agents/agent_types/

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=08qXj9w-CG4

item.title: RT Daniel San: Create React components with GPT-4-vision within VSCode 😱 Simply take a screenshot of any graphical interface and the chat will gene...
item.description:
RT Daniel San
Create React components with GPT-4-vision within VSCode 😱

Simply take a screenshot of any graphical interface and the chat will generate the corresponding React component for seamless integration into VSCode.

Download CodeGPT extension: https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=DanielSanMedium.dscodegpt…

Sign up for a… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1745290557516075171
